ComicInfo.Summary: Following the climactic events of the first Deity series and Deity: The Darkness and the Light, Jamie tries to pick up the pieces of her shattered life. Meanwhile, at the Junction, Red Flag Trooper Joe Tripoli tries to return to Earth to protect Jaime ? the daughter he never knew he had. Will the Ma'Shiva civil war sabotage his plans?!
ComicInfo.Writer: Robert Place Napton,Karl Altstaetter,Robert Napton,Karl Altstaetter,Robert Napton
